mapper.sql: SYS_ID, SYS_CODE, SYS_TITLE, SYS_DESC, IS_DELETE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ORG_ID
mapper.insert: insert into sys_info (SYS_ID, SYS_CODE, SYS_TITLE, SYS_DESC, IS_DELETE, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ORG_ID) values (#{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_info
SYS_ID,
SYS_CODE,
SYS_TITLE,
SYS_DESC,
IS_DELETE,
STATUS,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_TIME,
UPDATED_BY,
UPDATED_TIME,
ORG_ID,
#{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sysTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sysDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_info
SYS_CODE = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_TITLE = #{sysTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_DESC = #{sysDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_info set SYS_CODE = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_TITLE = #{sysTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_DESC = #{sysDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.STATUS, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.STATUS, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id LEFT JOIN acct_user_sys aus on aus.sys_Id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aus.acct_id=#{acctId}

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.STATUS, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.STATUS, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus,1 as status from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 1 and s.sys_id not in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id like CONCAT(#{orgId}, '%') and aos.ORG_ID != #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1)
UNION all
select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus,case when s.sys_id in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 1 and s.status=1) then 1 else 0 end as status from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id like CONCAT(#{orgId}, '%') and aos.ORG_ID != #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE,s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus,1 as status from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{quoteOrgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 1 and s.sys_id not in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1)
UNION all
select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus,case when s.sys_id in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{quoteOrgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 1 and s.status=1) then 1 else 0 end as status from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{orgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE,s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus,case when s.sys_id in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{quoteOrgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 1 and s.status=1) then 1 when s.sys_id in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{quoteOrgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1) then 1 else 0 end as status from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 1 and s.status=1

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE,s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus,case when s.sys_id in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{quoteOrgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 1 and s.status=1) then 1 when s.sys_id in (select s.SYS_ID from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.org_id = #{quoteOrgId} and s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1) then 1 else 0 end as status from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where s.is_delete = 0 and aos.status = 0 and s.status=1 aos.org_id = #{orgId}

select s.SYS_ID, s.SYS_CODE, s.SYS_TITLE, s.SYS_DESC, s.IS_DELETE, s.STATUS, s.CREATED_BY, s.CREATED_TIME, s.UPDATED_BY, s.UPDATED_TIME, s.ORG_ID,aos.status as relaStatus from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.status = 0 and s.is_delete = 0
select * from sys_info s LEFT JOIN ACCT_ORG_SYS aos on aos.sys_id=s.sys_id where aos.status=1 and s.sys_id = #{sysId}

select * from sys_info s where s.SYS_TITLE = #{sysTitle} and s.is_delete = 0
and s.SYS_ID not in (#{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
